## EventInterceptorContextData

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/components/common/EventInterceptor.ts" sourceLine="3" packageName="commandkit" />



```ts title="Signature"
interface EventInterceptorContextData<E extends keyof ClientEvents> {
    filter?: (...args: ClientEvents[E]) => Awaitable<boolean>;
    time?: number;
    autoReset?: boolean;
    once?: boolean;
    onEnd?: (reason: string) => Awaitable<void>;
    onError?: EventInterceptorErrorHandler;
}
```

<div className="members-wrapper">

### filter

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`(...args: ClientEvents[E]) =&#62; Awaitable&#60;boolean&#62;`}   />

The filter to use for the collector.
### time

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`number`}   />

The duration (in ms) that the collector should run for.
### autoReset

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`boolean`}   />

If the collector should automatically reset the timer when a button is clicked.
### once

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`boolean`}   />

Whether the collector should run only once.
### onEnd

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`(reason: string) =&#62; Awaitable&#60;void&#62;`}   />

The handler to run when the collector ends.
### onError

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`<a href='/docs/api-reference/commandkit/types/event-interceptor-error-handler#eventinterceptorerrorhandler'>EventInterceptorErrorHandler</a>`}   />

The handler to run upon an error.
